references: Related: CF 210248, CF 210180, CF 210249. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 11 to 14 inclusive, except the east 40 feet of said Lot 14, Block 5, H. E. Holmes Addition; a portion of the northwest quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 4-25-4, being known as Lot 51, High-Hurst on the Hill Addition (Unrecorded); and Tract 41, Excelsior Acre Tracts No. 2; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-282 and 17-229, respectively.
